<DOMAIN>ACCOUNTANT</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
FINANCIAL ACCOUNTANT

SUMMARY

Accomplished accountant and highly skilled controller with 8 years of experience and a keen ability to influence processes integral to company growth, drive operational excellence and achieve objectives.
Expertise in financial statement preparation and analysis, operational management, forecasting and cost control.
Open and clear communicator with demonstrated vision and disciplined execution.

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Developed and implemented fee calculation for a new hybrid product added to the product pallet (UBS Switzerland AG).
Assessed accounting system structures and converted company's accounting system to SAP B1 (Rising Tide GmbH).
Led the development of more than three new financial reporting methods to measure productivity and efficiency (Barclays Suisse SA).
Implemented processes that utilised accounts receivable sub-ledger for accounting and customer attribute reporting (UL AG).
Prepared complex financial statements and interim/annual reports for banks and holding companies (Barclays Suisse SA).
Highlights
Financial reporting expert
Variance analysis
P&L management
Process improvement
Complex problem solving
Critical thinking
Analytical
Decisive

<JD_START>
Job Title: Commercial Loan Officer

Location: Spencer, IA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Our client is seeking a Commerical Loan Officer to join their team as a perm employee. As a Commercial Loan Officer, you will execute all facets of lending operations for agricultural, commercial, and consumer clients, including prospecting and servicing both new and current customers. Oversees the commercial/business banking program and fulfills deposit responsibilities as needed, including the opening and maintenance of accounts.

Job Title: Commercial Loan Officer

Location: Clay County, IA

Pay Range: $90,000 to $110,000 base salary depending upon experience. 

What’s the Job?

 Manages the creation and administration of loan portfolios, overseeing every aspect from application to approval, collection, and liquidation of accounts, while also expanding the portfolio. Collaborates within a team setting with other officers on intricate credits and conducts individual loan analysis tasks.  Oversees the bank's Commercial Banking services encompassing Business Banking, remote capture, credit card services, and more.  Performs teller duties as required, handling currency, processing deposits and loan payments, and providing account balances.  Handles loan processing and support tasks, such as obtaining credit reports, processing applications, analyzing data, preparing loan documentation, and managing loan document filing.  Engages in community activities on behalf of the bank, participating in community events, serving as an active leader, and joining service clubs. 

What’s Needed?

 Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, Business, or related major or experience  Computer skills with proficiency in Word, Excel, Access, and Windows based applications.  Over 10 years commercial lending experience 

What’s in it for me?

 Health insurance  PTO  Bonus Plan 

If this is a role that interests you and you’d like to learn more, click apply now and a recruiter will be in touch with you to discuss this great opportunity. We look forward to speaking with you!

About ManpowerGroup, Parent Company of: Manpower, Experis, Talent Solutions, and Jefferson Wells

ManpowerGroup® (NYSE: MAN), the leading global workforce solutions company, helps organizations transform in a fast-changing world of work by sourcing, assessing, developing, and managing the talent that enables them to win. We develop innovative solutions for hundreds of thousands of organizations every year, providing them with skilled talent while finding meaningful, sustainable employment for millions of people across a wide range of industries and skills. Our expert family of brands –  Manpower, Experis, Talent Solutions, and Jefferson Wells  – creates substantial value for candidates and clients across more than 75 countries and territories and has done so for over 70 years. We are recognized consistently for our diversity - as a best place to work for Women, Inclusion, Equality and Disability and in 2022 ManpowerGroup was named one of the World's Most Ethical Companies for the 13th year - all confirming our position as the brand of choice for in-demand talent.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
